Value of the tag.

template<class T>
void QtConfFile::TagScalar< T >::queryOptValue ( T &  receiver  )  [inline]

Query optional value.

If isDefined() is true then receiver will be initialized with value of the tag, otherwise nothing with receiver will happen.
